attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP IF YOU ARE OR ARE NOT ALLERGIC TO CHEETOS
attributes.review: one day i was walking through the jungle when I got a call on my phone. i answered the phone and i heard Donald on the other line and he said “download my app and vote me for me or i’ll steal your house”. i said “😱😱😱😱😱 ok” and then proceeded to download the app. after i downloaded the app i got a text from Donald saying “haha you really thought i wouldn’t steal your house too bad”. i ran back home to my shoebox of a house (because rent is too high and Donald won’t do anything about it) and noticed my house was gone😭🥺. all that was left was a notice that i was getting EVICTED by guess who..... DONALD (no surprise there) i called Donald begging for my house back and he said “no go back to Africa where you came from” and i said “silly donald your people need to go back where they came from because you’re on stolen land that was built by my people” and he got very angry with my response and said “that’s it... i’m taking your phone” and the next thing i one my phone disappeared. so in conclusion: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP UNLESS YOU WANT TO BE HARASSED BY A CHEETO.💙🧚🏾‍♀️✨

attributes.title: my house flew away 🏚💨
attributes.review: First of all this up to 75 days to download.🤬 I just wanted to learn how to support my beloved president who loves and cares for every single person in the United States and doesn’t rob people for their money🧚🏽‍♀️. suddenly, the other bathroom toilets in my house started flooding 🌊and the flooding did not stop whatsoever we tried plugging everything in and my dog, my cat, the aliens next-door👅, everything but they just wouldn’t stop. next thing you know it and do my floorboards I hear a BOOM! 💥💥my house split into two pieces down the middle like Titanic. 🛥it wasn’t even windy the state it was literally 100° 🔥outside but somehow half of my house flew away like I didn’t know how to stop 👁👄👁 my sisters room and the kitchen was gone✨. we were just standing on the surface watching a house fly away into the atmosphere 🪐never to be seen again. I deleted the app and hope of my house to come back but it just kept flying away all the way up to Mars ☄️. I hope the aliens have a nice half of a house 👽and I don’t download this app because you’ll be homeless. 🥱

attributes.title: The annoying orange
attributes.review:
This app took 4 hours to download in my perfect wifi where everything else downloads easily. I was gonna use this app to see what all he was doing but, by the time it downloaded i knew it would be stupid already. But i opened it which was the dumbest mistake ive made ever. It was  saw something that literally killed my pet dinosaur. It was the annoying orange dancing naked waiting to become more orange. And then my screen changed it and it was the annoying orange running on a treadmill only wearing his 
Cheeto puff boxers. So I exited the app as fast as i could and went to sleep. Then I had a horrible nightmare It was the big cheeto man himself but this time he was skinny dipping in clear water. So I shot straight up and bleached my eyes... which it did not work sadly. Then it was 8am and I opened my phone and my lockscreen had now turner to the big cheeto himself doing jumping jacks with only his boxers. 🧚🏾🧚🏾So I went and deleted the app but I still have horrible nightmares and hallucinations about it.🧚🏾🧚🏾 so if u wanna ruin ur App i still dont recommend this app.

attributes.title: I AM DISGUSTED🤢🤮
attributes.review:
❌I CANNOT BELIEVE HOW HORRIBLE THIS APP IS❌. First of all, I opened the app and this GOD AWFUL screeching sound starting blasting, I went into cardiac arrest and had to go to the ER. After I was ok in the hospital I checked the app and I cannot explain how horrible the sight I saw was. It was a piece of dooky on a stick 💩😵😵, like what the heck?!?!?!?! (I think it was Cheeto’s dooky too 🤢🤢🤮). THEN AN ADD POPPED UP FOR A NAUGHTY NAUGHTY SITE😳 ❌❌‼️. My hamster saw it and I had to BLEACH HIS EYES 😧😤. HE WAS AND STILL IS TRAUMATIZED BY THIS. I took him on a walk around the refrigerator outside my back porch and his is still SHIVERING (and walks are his favorite thing). Then all of a sudden, my phone started to glitch. Cheeto popped up and started to chose me through the phone🙀!!!!! I was very confused by what was all going on. So I threw my phone across the room and mr. Cheeto guy person came OUT OF MY PHONE and started to DEFAULT DANCE👹. This was very offensive to me. Default dancing should not be taken light heartily, it is a very serious situation 😠. This app is AWFUL. ⚠️ I am DISGUSTED. Do NOT download this app ⚠️. I am HURT and BETRAYED 😪😪😿. 

Heart been broke so many times iiiiii 😪🤧🤧

#BLM    #ACAB

attributes.title: HORRIBLE DISGUSTING CHEETO
attributes.review: UGH I HATE THIS APP😾 I don’t even know where to begin. It takes for ever to download and when I opened it I saw this horrible burnt crusty Cheeto 🙀and my eyes hurt from that 😡 also it kicked me off so but I saw a big fat juicy 🍑 on my lock screen of a Cheeto so I covered my eyes because it was too juicy🙈 and then when I got off my bed some crusty dirty hands grabbed my feet 😭they were orange which only meant one thing 😡 I called the popo and they came but since it was an orange they couldn’t take IT to jail😪 so I robbed the orange and I got rich🤑 after that I went to sleep and I had nightmares 😾it was a big fat orange eating a Cheeto which made me confused cause they’re both the same thing🤨 anyways I looked over to my window and I saw the BIG FAT ORANGE EATING A CHEETO 🙀🙀🙀 so I ran out of my house and it chased me😿luckily I’m speedy fast and that orange was built like a chicken nugget so I outran it😼 BUT THEN the oranges legs fell off🙀 I was very shocked but then my mom told me to go eat dinner, that’s why I had this great idea😌 I ATE THE ORANGES LEGGGSSSS 🤪😋 so if you don’t want any of this to happen don’t get the app 👁👅👁

attributes.title: Dusty orange peel🟠✨
attributes.review: After waiting 7 years and 82 months for this app to download i was finally able to login and unleash my inner conservative🇺🇸 but i was rudely awakened with the hard truth that this app was utterly 𝗥𝗜𝗗𝗜𝗖𝗨𝗟𝗢𝗨𝗦👺  and it had a white refrigerator not a white refrigerator and then my MICROWAVE had the audacity to come to life and start playing a song that just says🟡“black and yellow”⚫️ over and over again and so i had no other choice but to blame trumps 𝗧𝗘𝗥𝗥𝗜𝗕𝗟𝗘 app but just when i thought it couldn’t get any worse tiny Guinea pigs🐹🐷 started WALKING into my house on there hind legs 🚶‍♂️they were also wearing what looked like spy gear on their heads the leader🧍 of the group told me to stay calm and not call the police but i refused because #bluelivesmatter👮‍♂️❤️ and when i picked my phone up to call our heroes  🦸‍♂️ the Guinea pig lunged at me and started to eat me alive a few days later i woke up in a hospital in Virginia in a body cast and little did i know a zombie apocalypse 🧟‍♀️ had broken out and now i start my mission to find my son and my cheating wife.👨‍👩‍👦

attributes.title: So bad 🤢😡 DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: This app took a MONTH to download which I think is absolutely bulingalling!!! So I thought this would be the most well cooked app on the market but I was disturbingly mistaken... when I was signing in to the app the background wallpaper was a grown man with micky mouse face paint on and a unsettling look on his face and on top of that when I put in my password the mouse moved on the screen and pointed to the left. All of a sudden a STAN PIED oF MICE started to scurry to the left of my room!!😡 my dog started barking and one of the mice took out a rifle and shot my dog down😖 rest in piece marly 😣 you were the best dog I had I remember when I first got you oh the tears of joy 🤩 and now the tears of pain 😢 when will thee ever see thou again 😔 when will I ever see your face when I gave you treats ever again😭 the despair the pain the anger this app brought me is saddening ☹️ the mice brought marly 🐕 to a van they had outside of my house and off my dog went to somewhere I will never know but I have a hunch she’s at the white so I will see her soon I will get into the white and bring my dog back 😠

attributes.title: Such a inappropriate app
attributes.review: I will say that this app is unprofessional and very inappropriate for people to see I cannot explain how OUTRAGED I am right now I expect high expectations from when I first down load to when I die but NO, the amount of disrespectful comments I have got from this unprofessional app is beyond unacceptable I wish this app was more uptrend with the time but it is VERY slow with the internet, my McDonald’s WiFi is way stronger to be capable of producing a update per day but NO this app definitely deserves to be put on hold for the rest of its days I’m sure people do not want to see a 🍊 yelling in there face 25/8! I’m sure you would make this performance better but as if right now I am not unsatisfied with this app and the developer of this “app” it is more terrible then XVideos WHICH is VERY inappropriate and when I asked for a bug to be fixed it declined me setting my email up I could type nor text which is my freedom of speech and my law. At the end of the day I wish this app was more professional then its not I’m going to leave a FAT one star on this app

attributes.title: I’m doing Gods Work by reviewing this trash app
attributes.review: So I downloaded this thinking “Yess finally!! This is going to surpass any of my beautiful expectations” When I tell you I was dead wrong. Eww this is horrible. I thought that this was going to have a virtual rally so he can grace my personal Mac book Air that was assembled in California’s Screen but nope. Don’t be fooled like me. Yuck there’s nothing to do. BORING.  I don’t need a app that’s taking up my precious phone storage to just be boring. Now I have to deal with the annoying “Keep everything safe in iCloud... Your last iPhone Backup could not be saved in iCloud... 50 GB for .99 a month bUy sToRage” thinking I’m really going to spend my money on more storage besides our feminist anti-racist,-homophobic, -transphobic, -xenophobic queen (not king that’s how he much toxic masculinity he does nOt have) that is the president. Ugh I swear after downloading this I got a cold IN THE SUMMER. HOW THE HELL DOES THAT HAPPEN. Yeah this is a terrible app. You don’t got it Trump. You’re not a icon living. You’re not on the path of greatness. Try again luv 🧚🏽‍♂️🍀✨☀️🧃💖👁👅👁💋💄💚🌸🌼🌻🌺

attributes.title: READ UNTIL THE END
attributes.review: alright where do i even start. lemme just start off but saying this is the worst, most horrible, diabolical, disgusting, horrendous, revolting, sickening, repulsive app i have ever had the unfortunate chance of downloading. please i beg of you do not EVER GET THIS APP. it took 3 years to download and it took up ALL OF MY STORAGE. along with deleting all of my photos and deleting almost every single app that i have downloaded in my phone. EVEN MY PHOTOS APP WHICH I DIDN'T KNOW WAS POSSIBLE. i am deeply disappointed in this app and i am warning everyone who stumbles upon this to NEVER DOWNLOAD THIS APP. all of my pictures are gone.  my album of 800 harry styles photos? gone. my christmas countdown app? gone. my music app, my only form of happiness? gone. my jetpack joy ride app? gone. my minecraft app? GONE. the only thing that was left was this app store which and i am very grateful for so that  i could rate this terrible, horrible, no good, very bad app. so please, i beg of you, do not download this app. instead of wasting your time doing so, PLEASE GO SIGN PETITONS AND DONATE TO THOSE IN NEED. thank you.
